title: Drawing, "Design for Woven Rug "Terracotta""
medium: Graphite, brown and orange crayon on tracing paper
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite in margin, beneath lower right corner of image:  RUG IN TERRA COTTA
creditline: Gift of Mr. Eric and Mrs. Sylvia Elsesser, The Trude Guermonprez Archives
description: Design divided into rectangular boxes on grid, roughly  two inches across and one/half inch down; some of rectangles colored.

tombstone.epitaph: Drawing, "Design for Woven Rug "Terracotta"".Graphite, brown and orange crayon on tracing paper. Gift of Mr. Eric and Mrs. Sylvia Elsesser, The Trude Guermonprez Archives. 1993-121-87.
